recipes.title: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti; fry bacon; mix with eggs and cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry chicken and vegetables; add soy sauce; serve with rice.

recipes.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.instructions: Roll out pizza dough; spread tomato sauce; top with sliced mozzarella and basil; bake until crust is golden.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Sauté tofu and vegetables in sesame oil; add soy sauce; serve over rice.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef with taco seasoning; assemble tacos with desired toppings.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta; sauté chicken and garlic; add cream and parmesan; toss with cooked pasta.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.instructions: Sauté mushrooms and onions; add rice and wine; gradually add broth; stir in butter and parmesan.

recipes.title: BBQ Pulled Beef Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Slow-cook beef with BBQ sauce until tender; shred and serve on buns with coleslaw.

recipes.title: Beef Burger
recipes.instructions: Form beef into patties; grill to desired doneness; assemble burgers with toppings and condiments.

recipes.title: Thai Green Curry
recipes.instructions: Simmer chicken and vegetables in coconut milk and curry paste; garnish with basil leaves.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Scampi
recipes.instructions: Sauté shrimp and garlic in butter; add lemon juice and wine; toss with cooked pasta and parsley.

recipes.title: Butternut Squash Soup
recipes.instructions: Roast squash, onion, and garlic; blend with broth, coconut milk, and spices; simmer until heated through.

recipes.title: Lentil Curry
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger; add lentils, tomatoes, and spices; simmer in coconut milk.

recipes.title: Homemade Sushi Rolls
recipes.instructions: Prepare sushi rice; assemble rolls with fish, vegetables, and nori; slice and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, cheese, and dressing; garnish with lemon wedges and anchovies.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.instructions: Sauté beef, onions, and mushrooms; stir in sour cream and broth; serve over cooked noodles.

recipes.title: Vegetable Paella
recipes.instructions: Sauté vegetables; add rice and broth; simmer until rice is cooked; garnish with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices; grill or sauté; simmer in tomato sauce with onions and spices.

recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.instructions: Slice and bread eggplant; fry until golden; layer with marinara sauce and cheese; bake until bubbly.

recipes.title: Shish Taouk (Lebanese Chicken Kebabs)
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut chicken breast into bite-sized cubes.
2. In a bowl, mix minced garlic, lemon juice, yogurt, olive oil, paprika, cumin, turmeric, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper to make the marinade.
3. Add chicken cubes to the marinade and coat evenly. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours (preferably overnight) to marinate.
4. Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
5. Thread marinated chicken cubes onto skewers, alternating with pieces of red onion and bell peppers if desired.
6. Grill kebabs for about 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until chicken is cooked through and slightly charred.
7. Serve hot with rice or pita bread and a side of garlic sauce or tahini sauce.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.instructions: Soak noodles; stir-fry shrimp, tofu, and vegetables; toss with noodles, sauce, and peanuts.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.instructions: Marinate salmon in olive oil, garlic, and herbs; grill until cooked through; serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: fish-n-chips
recipes.instructions: Add spices to fillet and chips, fry on low heat for 15 to 20 minutes
